home.headline: Invest in Bulgarian Real Estate
home.description: Access curated residential and mixed-use opportunities with structured SPV protection, transparent budgets, and investor-first reporting.
how.title: How It Works
how.subtitle: A clear path from project discovery to verified ownership and reporting.
how.step1.title: 1. Explore
how.step1.body: Review strategy, expected returns, and underwriting assumptions for each listed project.
how.step2.title: 2. Verify
how.step2.body: Complete KYC before checkout so capital movement and investor records stay compliant.
how.step3.title: 3. Invest
how.step3.body: Choose an amount within project limits and continue to secure checkout.
how.step4.title: 4. Track
how.step4.body: Follow milestones, progress updates, wallet exposure, and distributions in your dashboard.
about.title: About Building Investment
about.subtitle: A Bulgarian-focused platform for disciplined real estate investing with transparent reporting.
about.p1: We structure opportunities through project-level SPVs and publish clear underwriting assumptions before checkout.
about.p2: Investor dashboards provide capital exposure, milestone progress, and distribution visibility in one place.
about.p3: Our operating model prioritizes compliance, predictable execution, and long-term trust with investors.
admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.subtitle: Operational control center for project owners and administrators.
admin.projects.title: Project Pipeline
admin.projects.subtitle: Review and prioritize project operations before investor-facing publication.
admin.projects.placeholder: Project management controls are being rolled out in the next iteration.
admin.investors.title: Investor Operations
admin.investors.subtitle: Track investor onboarding, verification, and support priorities.
admin.investors.placeholder: Investor operations controls are being rolled out in the next iteration.
home.snapshot.note: MVP foundation in progress: authentication, KYC onboarding, and investment checkout workflows.
